name: Yeti Rambler 10 Lowball With Magslider Lid
description: Perfect for those who want a travel mug, but don’t want to down a half a litre of coffee.Made of 18/8 stainless steel with double-walled vacuum insulation.MagSlider™ holds in place with the power of magnetism, which eliminates the need for grooves or rails (and makes it easy to clean).Spill-resistant design helps reduce the risk of sloshing.Clear lid lets you see when you need a refill.Dishwasher safe and BPA-free.Dimensions: 10.5 x 8.9cm.
